---
title: "Plots"
output: html_document
---

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Here is a dataframe
```{r}
plot_df = 
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1 + 2 + x + rnorm(100)
  )
```

Here is a plot
```{r}
plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
